entry.title: Livin' on the Edge with Al Tobey
entry.content:
Join us as we discuss how to test your distributed system in production with Al Tobey

Watch Now

  • Panel
  • Chef News
  • Outline
  • Picks
  • Download
    • Audio
    • Video

Panel

  • Al Tobey, Open Source Mechanic at Datastax github, twitter
  • Bryan Berry github, twitter, irc: bryanwb, blog: devopsanywhere
  • Mike Fiedler github, twitter, blog

Outline

  • Introductions
  • Practice Makes Perfect: Extreme Cassandra Optimization
  • cassandra
  • Apache Cassandra Wiki
  • Cassandra vs Riak
  • DataStax and Cassandra
  • Red Hat
  • MongoDB
  • Oracle JDK and OpenJDK
  • Optimization
  • Third-Party Integration
  • Red Hat and Twitter
  • How Cassandra Deals with the Heap Space Issue
  • Read Ahead
  • Starting Points
  • System D
  • File Systems

Picks

Bryan

  • Remapping the right option key on the Macbook to be a Control key
  • M-f, M-b, M-d, M-del shortcuts in the shell, see the Emacs Readline Cheatsheet

Al

  • Vibram shoes
  • Serfdom

Mike

  • Basil Polenta with Poached egg and lemon roasted brussel sprouts
  • Ruby Monk Ruby Tutorials
